A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a real treat. Never been the biggest of Star Wars fans\, but I enjoyed this one and I feel like it expands upon the story established in Force Awakens even more so. The character of Ben Solo is fleshed out as well as Rey and their whole light - dark duality seems fantastic. The late Carrie Fisher was phenomenal in her role and just glad to see her. The cinematography in some scenes was breath taking. I found it disappointing how Snokes was not explained at all and cast aside but that's rather minor. The theme of failure being a great teacher hit really home. Aside from the aforementioned Snokes issues and sometimes some scenes dragging on too long it was an enjoyable ride.
